body.p:
Mr. Murchison, the general secretary, in referring to
the number of foreigners present, announced the presence
of a deputation from the Italian Association for the Advance-
ment of Science, which will be held at Pisa, in October;
of a deputation to represent a special meeting of the
Geological Society of France, which will be held at Bo-
logne, in October; and from the Association of German
Naturalists, which will be held at Clermont, next month.
He also read a letter from Baron Humboldt, addressed to
J. L. Moillet, Esq., of which the following is a transla-
tion:—

div.p:
“I cannot express to you, sir, how much I have been
flattered by the expression of the kind and friendly feelings
contained in your letter of the 24th of May last. The in-
vitation of the distinguished British Association for the
Advancement of Science has penetrated me with the most
lively sense of gratitude; I entreat you, sir, to accept the
assurance of it, and to be the interpreter of my respectful
sentiments to the committee. I regret extremely not to
be able to avail myself of your liberal offer. My residence
in your house, its proximity to a town whose wealth is the
fruit of intelligence, and the hope of meeting there some of
my friends, would have greatly enhanced the gratification
which must arise from the imposing re-union of the
scientific men of England. It certainly is not the sacrifice
of time, nor the dread of locomotion, which detains me
on the continent. My position no longer affords me the
freedom which I enjoyed in the forests of the Orinoco, or
in the wilds of the Oby. The King, whom I am in the
habit of accompanying in his travels, does not set out this
year before the middle of July, and his absence in Bohemia
and in the mountains of Silesia, will be protracted until
the early part of September. Accept, sir, the expression
of my high consideration, and of the affectionate regard
with which I have the honour to be,
div.closer:
“Your most obedient and humble servant,
(Signed) “The Baron de Humboldt.
“J. L. Moillet, Esq.”
